Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Zp_invert_stable : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0%nat) (Hp' : prime p) (n : nat), (1 < n < p - 1)%nat -> exists m : nat, (1 < m < p - 1)%nat /\ nat2Zp Hp m = Zp_invert Hp Hp' (nat2Zp Hp n)
Zp_ring_ring_lemma1 : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0%nat) (n : nat) (l : list (Z_Zp p)) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist (Zp_zero Hp) (Zp_one Hp) (Zp_plus Hp) (Zp_mult Hp) (fun x y : Z_Zp p => Zp_plus Hp x (Zp_opp Hp y)) (Zp_opp Hp) eq (gen_phiZ (Zp_zero Hp) (Zp_one Hp) (Zp_plus Hp) (Zp_mult Hp) (Zp_opp Hp)) id_phi_N (pow_N (Zp_one Hp) (Zp_mult Hp)) l lpe -> (let lmp := Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem lpe in...
alpha_nat_fix_2 : forall n : nat, alpha_nat (S (S n)) = (b_nat * alpha_nat (S n) - alpha_nat n)%nat
Nat2Z.inj_add : forall n m : nat, Z.of_nat (n + m) = Z.of_nat n + Z.of_nat m
Z2Zp_morphishm : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0%nat), ring_morphism 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.opp (Zp_zero Hp) (Zp_one Hp) (Zp_plus Hp) (Zp_mult Hp) (Zp_opp Hp) (Z2Zp Hp)
Nat2Z.inj_mul : forall n m : nat, Z.of_nat (n * m) = Z.of_nat n * Z.of_nat m
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1%nat /\ (forall q : nat, q │ p -> q = 1%nat \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
alpha_Z_S : forall n : nat, α (S n) = Z.of_nat (alpha_nat n)
nat2Zp_choose : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0%nat) (x : Z_Zp p), x = Zp_zero Hp \/ x = Zp_one Hp \/ x = Zp_opp Hp (Zp_one Hp) \/ (exists m : nat, (1 < m < p - 1)%nat /\ nat2Zp Hp m = x)

rewrite alpha_nat_fix_2.
rewrite Nat2Z.inj_sub_max.

rewrite mscal_Zplus.
rewrite Nat2Z.inj_mul.
rewrite alpha_Z_S.
rewrite Zp_ring_ring_lemma2.
rewrite Zp_ring_ring_lemma1.
rewrite Hq.
rewrite mult_le_compat.
auto.
